pages.text: 17|28|Ara yadi tadera theke tamara mukha phirate'i haya, yakhana tomara rabera kacha theke anugraha labhera pratyasaya, takhana tadera sathe namrabhabe katha bala [1]
17|29|ara tumi tomara hata galaya bemdhe rekho na ebam ta sampurnarupe mele'o di'o na, tahale tumi tiraskrta o aphasosakrta haye base parabe [1].
17|30|Niscaya'i tomara raba yara jan'ya icche tamra riyaka bariye dena ebam yara jan'ya icche ta simita karena; niscaya tini tamra bandadera sambandhe samyaka parijnata, sarbadrasta [1].
17|31|Ara tomara tomadera santanderake daridra-bhaye hatya karo na. Taderake'o ami'i riyaka de'i ebam tomaderake'o. Niscaya taderake hatya kara mahapapa [1].
17|32|Ara yinara dhare-kache'o ye'o na, niscaya ta aslila o nikrsta acarana [1].

17|33|Ara allaha yara hatya nisid'dha karechena yathartha karana chara take hatya karo na [1]! Ke'u an'yayabhabe nihata hale tara uttaradhikarike to amara tara pratikarera adhikara diyechi [2]; kintu hatya byapare se yena barabari na kare [3]; se to sahayya prapta hayeche'i.
17|34|Ara iyatima bayoprapta na ha'oya paryanta sadupaye chara tara sampattira dhare-kache'o ye'o na ebam pratisruti palana karo. Niscaya pratisruti samparke kaiphiyata talaba kara habe.
17|35|Ara mepe deyara samaya purna mape da'o ebam ojana kara sathika damripallaya [1], eta'i uttama ebam pariname utkrsta [2].
17|36|Ara ye bisaye tomara jnana ne'i tara anusarana karo na [1]; kana, cokha, hrdaya- edera pratyekati samparke kaiphiyata talaba kara habe [2].
17|37|Ara yamine dambhabhare bicarana karo na; tumi to kakhana'i padabhare bhuprstha bidirna karate parabe na ebam uccataya tumi kakhana'i parabata pramana hate parabe na [1].
17|38|E sabera madhye ya manda ta apanara rabera kache ghrnya [1].
